sentences.en: “So I had my little jar with a tight sealing top and a paper sack, and during intermission, I went to the toilet,” Dr. Kelsey said with a smile.
sentences.cn: 于是我带上了一个有密封口的小瓶子和一个纸袋子去看戏，在幕间休息的时候，我就去上厕所。

sentences.en: All intermission sequences: A sound will confirm correct code entry.
sentences.cn: 所有的中止序列: 一种声音将会确定正确的密码进入.

sentences.en: Coffee was served during the intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时有咖啡供应。

sentences.en: Device for intermission charging and alcohol spray can be mounted.
sentences.cn: 可安装间歇充气装置和喷酒精装置.

sentences.en: Drills were set to work without intermission.
sentences.cn: 螺旋钻在一刻不停地挥舞着.

sentences.en: During the intermission, let's go out for some fresh air.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时, 我们出去呼吸呼吸新鲜空气吧.

sentences.en: Fraser did not perform until after intermission.
sentences.cn: 弗雷泽直到中场休息之后才上场。

sentences.en: Her fever lasted five days without intermission.
Intermission process industry required to synthesize DCS and PLC.
sentences.cn: 而间歇过程工业,则需要dcs和 PLC的综合运用.而现在,这种情况发生了根本性的变化.

sentences.en: It was the first time Hanna had been to the theater, and she loved all of it, from the performance to the champagne at intermission.
sentences.cn: 我们曾去过一次附近另一座城市的剧院看席勒的《阴谋与爱情》。 这是汉娜头一次去戏院看戏，从观看表演到幕间休息时喝香槟酒，她高兴得不得了。

sentences.en: Make you life a mission, not intermission.
sentences.cn: 让生命成为一项使命, 而不是一次停顿.

sentences.en: The idea of never allowing any pause, any intermission, is wrong.
sentences.cn: 那种不许有停顿 、 不许有间歇的思想是错误的.

sentences.en: The music has paused but we're only merely taking a short intermission.
sentences.cn: 音乐已经暂时停止了,但是我们仅仅是在做短的间歇.

sentences.en: The violinist resumed playing after intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息后,小提琴家继续演奏.

sentences.en: The violinist resumed playing after the intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息之后,那小提琴手又重新开始演奏.

sentences.en: Theatre lobbies were filled with a vociferous crowd during the intermission.
sentences.cn: 剧场大厅放映间隙,人群中发出喧闹的嘈杂声.

sentences.en: We had a short intermission halfway through a film.
sentences.cn: 我们电影放映中途做了短暂的休息.

words.tran_cn: 间奏曲；插曲；幕间剧；芭蕾舞表演
时断时续，间歇性；周期性
间歇性；间歇现象；间歇度
间歇抽油装置；间歇调节器

trans.tran_cn: 间歇，停顿，（放映电影中）中间休息
trans.tran_en: a short period of time between the parts of a play, concert etc
